titles.title: The Sexual Life of the Camel

properties.tune: My Bonnie Lies over the Ocean
properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 c1 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: The sexual life of the Camel Is stranger than anyone thinks One night in a moment of passion He tried to deflower the Sphinx!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Now, the Sphinx's posterior anatomy Is covered with sand from the Nile. That accounts for the hump in the Camel, And the Sphinx's inscrutable smile!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: The One skin lies over the Two skin The Two skin lies over the Three The Three skin lies over the Foreskin Please roll back my Foreskin for me

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Roll back, roll back, Roll back my Foreskin for me, for me!, Roll back, roll back, Roll back my Foreskin for me!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: The Baron, he rides on a warhorse, With a fancy great helluva rig, He doesn't get there any faster, But it makes the old bastard feel big!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: The King, he sleeps in a feather bed The Knights all sleep in their sacks; As a means of self-preservation, The squires all sleep on their backs!

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: And here's to the girls of St Golias And here's to the alleys they roam, And here's to their dirty-faced bastards, God bless 'em, they may be your own!
